pullRequest.title: Publish individual module jars to Bintray
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
This publishes individual module jars to Bintray under the tech.pegasys.teku.internal groupId.
Fixed Issue(s)

commit.message: move bintray depedencies to top of gradle file so publish has the declared values

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -44,6 +44,28 @@ gradle.startParameter.taskNames.each {
 gradle.startParameter.taskNames = expandedTaskList.flatten() as Iterable<String>
 
 def userHome = System.getProperty("user.home")
+
+apply plugin: 'com.jfrog.bintray'
+
+def bintrayUser = project.hasProperty('bintrayUser') ? project.property('bintrayUser') : System.getenv('BINTRAY_USER')
+def bintrayKey = project.hasProperty('bintrayApiKey') ? project.property('bintrayApiKey') : System.getenv('BINTRAY_KEY')
+
+def bintrayPackage = bintray.pkg {
+  repo = 'pegasys-repo'
+  name = 'teku'
+  userOrg = 'consensys'
+  desc = 'Java Implementation of the Ethereum 2.0 Beacon Chain'
+  licenses = ['Apache-2.0']
+  websiteUrl = 'https://github.com/PegaSysEng/artemis'

+  issueTrackerUrl = 'https://github.com/PegaSysEng/artemis/issues'

commit.message: rename artemis references in bintray package
Merge branch 'bintray_jars' of github.com:jframe/artemis into bintray_jars
